CustomField.description:
if Forecast Category equals Risk, Upside, Secure OR RoP AND Period is in past (reference End Date of Nokia Financial Calendar record) = TRUE (Req:186)
Req #2656 : Change the label from "Past Due" to "Data Quality Past Due"
CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c , "Risk"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Upside"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Secure"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "ROP"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Excluded") ) && ( POPlanReceipt__r.End_Date__c <= Today() )=True
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates, if the OIF line is open but is assigned to a period in the past. If so, please update Forecast Category or Period
CustomField.label: Data Quality Past Due
